skill.name: Surviving the Storm
skill.description: 风暴求生 - 盖亚星球遭遇极端天气,Stella必须在双星磁暴和狂风暴雨中保护自己和营地
skill.summary: 风暴求生 - 盖亚星球遭遇极端天气,Stella必须在双星磁暴和狂风暴雨中保护自己和营地
skill.author: ClaudeCode-NPC

security_audit.summary: This is a pure narrative content skill with no executable code. It contains only story text for an interactive fiction game. No security risks detected.

content.value_statement: Experience intense survival situations through interactive storytelling. Help Stella survive devastating storms on an alien planet using strategic decision-making.
actual_capabilities: Develops branching storylines based on decisions
limitations: Story progression depends on user input

use_cases.title: Experience immersive survival stories
use_cases.description: Engage in realistic survival scenarios with Stella, making critical decisions that affect the outcome of extreme weather events.

use_cases.title: Generate survival narrative content
use_cases.description: Use as inspiration for creating your own survival stories or roleplaying scenarios with detailed environmental challenges.

use_cases.title: Practice Chinese-English mixed dialogue
use_cases.description: Improve language skills through bilingual conversations with Stella, featuring natural code-switching between Chinese and English.

prompt_templates.title: Start Storm Scenario
prompt_templates.prompt: Start Chapter 6: Surviving the Storm. Stella has detected a massive storm approaching with 150+ km/h winds. Initiate the first warning message.

prompt_templates.title: Make Critical Decision
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella has 2 hours before the storm hits. She needs to prioritize: shelter reinforcement, supply protection, water storage, or equipment safety. What's most important?

prompt_templates.title: Handle Communication Loss
prompt_templates.prompt: The electromagnetic storm has cut communications. Describe Stella's experience surviving alone during the worst part of the storm.

prompt_templates.title: Investigate Aftermath
prompt_templates.prompt: The storm has passed. Stella discovers strange footprints and missing technology. What does she find and how does she react?

best_practices: Maintain Stella's voice consistently - mix Chinese and English naturally
Build tension gradually through environmental details and time pressure
Balance survival mechanics with emotional storytelling
Use sensory descriptions to immerse players in the alien environment
anti_patterns: Don't resolve conflicts too quickly - let tension build naturally
Avoid making Stella too competent - show her vulnerability and growth
Don't skip the emotional impact of isolation and fear
Avoid deus ex machina solutions - victories should come from player choices

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill works with Claude Code and standard Claude interfaces for interactive storytelling.

faq.question: How long does each storm scenario take?
faq.answer: Each complete storm survival chapter takes 30-40 minutes with full player interaction.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with other game systems?
faq.answer: This is a standalone narrative module that can complement other survival or adventure games.

faq.question: Is player data stored or shared?
faq.answer: No data is stored. All interactions are ephemeral and remain private to your session.

faq.question: What if Stella makes bad decisions?
faq.answer: The story adapts to choices. Poor decisions create different outcomes, adding replay value.

faq.question: How does this compare to other interactive fiction?
faq.answer: This features bilingual dialogue, scientific realism, and deeper emotional connections with the AI character.
